forest_camp1.multi_cat: In the past moon, o_n_g have taken their places in StarClan. c_n mourns their loss, and their friends and family shared the best, and sometimes the worse, moments of their lives in stories passed around the circle of mourners as the elders carried them to their final resting place dug for them out in the forest.
forest_camp1.single_cat: In the past moon, o_n_g has taken their place in StarClan. c_n mourns their loss, and their friends and family shared the best, and sometimes the worse, moments of their lives in stories passed around the circle of mourners as the elders carried them to their final resting place dug for them out in the forest.

forest_camp2.multi_cat: Over the past moon, o_n_g have passed away, and all been farewelled in the traditions of c_n. All adults wore the full ceremonial scents of c_n, taken from the sap and leaves and bark of their forest home, and o_n_g were washed, one by one, until their fur was clean and scentless and as fluffy and soft as the day they were born. The Clan has buried them under layers of dirt and nursery bedding, leaving their bodies in the softest of covered nests as their souls pad to StarClan.
forest_camp2.single_cat: Over the past moon, o_n_g has passed away and been farewelled in the traditions of c_n. All adult mourners wore the full ceremonial scents of c_n, taken from the sap and leaves and bark of their forest home, and o_n_g was washed until their fur was clean and scentless and as fluffy and soft as the day they were born. The Clan has buried them under layers of dirt and nursery bedding, leaving their body in the softest of covered nests as their soul pads to StarClan.
